subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In his return from a rotator-cuff injury, New Orleans quarterback Drew Brees went 32 of 39 and hit C. J. Spiller on the second play of overtime for an 80-yard touchdown to sink Dallas.
snippet: In his return from a rotator-cuff injury, New Orleans quarterback Drew Brees went 32 of 39 and hit C. J. Spiller on the second play of overtime for an 80-yard touchdown to sink Dallas.
